status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3fn81","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6m6n","text":"NOTE: This is suitable for small numbers of samples (i.e. less than 24), including the quantification of the final libraries using the next generation sequencing SOP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2usth","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rqnq","text":"Label the required number of 0.5 ml tubes for Standard 1, Standard 2 and all your samples (use only the specific Qubit Assay tubes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4oqqq","text":"Label a 5 ml tube with ‘Qubit Working Solution’.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22ue9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5995a","text":"Alliquot Qubit Working Solution into each of the tubes used for Standard 1 and Standard 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"deif7","text":"Aliquot  Qubit Working Solution into each individual assay tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"190","error":false,"guid":"674FECBCE94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"198","error":false,"guid":"6E9A089CE94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fn5d","text":"Add   Qubit Buffer (either BR or HS, depending on the assay you want to do) to the 5 ml tube (n = samples + 2 standards + 1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ejkb","text":"Add   Qubit Reagent (either BR or HS, depending on the assay you want to do) to the tube, mix by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"70f9h","text":"Tip: use a low vortex speed to avoid frothing; excessive frothing may require the preparation of additional diluted reagent to allow sufficient volume for all samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"199","error":false,"guid":"4AD0A4BDE94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"x n","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"53B264FBE94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"x n","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1a0k8","text":"Add  of Qubit Standard 1 and Standard 2 to the appropriate tube (the final volume will be 200 μl). Mix by vortexing 2-3 seconds, be careful not to create bubbles.\nAdd   stock DNA to the tube (the final volume will be 200 μl). Mix by vortexing 2-3 seconds, be careful not to create bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":167,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"78606FDEE94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"8AF25B09E94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bsggd","text":"Select high-sensitivity double-stranded DNA assay on the Qubit and read the standards when prompted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cthaa","text":"Read samples when prompted (no need to re-read standards between readings) and record DNA concentration in ng/ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2bu0p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nibv","text":"Incubate all tubes at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aqa45","text":"Tip: the fluorescence signal is stable for 3 hours at room temperature, so samples can be re-read if necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2","duration":300,"error":false,"guid":"8426F387E94411EB90F80A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":1}}}}
